name: Connect Fur
description:
WORK IN PROGRESS

Future goals:
- A second gamemode
- Collection of all the animals + interesting facts
- More animals
- 2 more animal abilities
- Sounds + music
- Controller support

Donations will go towards the music soundtracks!  (If you know someone, shoot me a message👀)

Join my discord (https://discord.gg/x9uh79Xjqn) to chat about the game and also share your own projects!
